description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.3gRYyamF1QTHJDlK]{Fountain of Flame}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.OjufbMVAz4v8eSDY]{Phantom Chasm}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.t5HN3avcQpE0PWyg]{Sleep}
